project.description: Backs up all jobs to a github repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GITUSER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: What user are you identifying yourself to git as?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: What is the url of the git repo where the jenkins jobs are stored?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: COMMENT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: What comment do you want for the commit that will be pushed to git?

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/jenkins_home/jobs eval `ssh-agent -s` ssh-add /usr/share/jenkins/ref/github_id_jenkins_rsa # ssh -T git@github.com if [ ! -d .git ] ; then git init git config user.email "jenkins@bu.edu" git config user.name $GITUSER git remote add github $REPO fi if [ ! -f .gitignore ] ; then echo > .gitignore "# Ignore everything in subdirectories" echo >> .gitignore "/*/*" echo >> .gitignore "# ...except the config.xml file in those subdirectories" echo >> .gitignore "!/**/config.xml" echo >> .gitignore "#...and this file" echo >> .gitignore "!.gitignore" fi
if [ -n "$(git status -s -z)" ] ; then echo "Found changes to push." git add --all git commit -m "$COMMENT" git push github master else echo "No changes! Nothing to commit! Push cancelled!" fi eval `ssh-agent -k`
